name: Cold War Diplomacy in Europe
description:
Cold War Diplomacy In Europe was a game created for the Historically Accurate Game Jam. This game is a strategy map game in which you play as either the US or the USSR  and attempt to bring other countries to your alliance (Warsaw Pact or Nato).  The Alliance with the most amount of points, displayed as flags, wins the game. Good luck on your adventure as leader of your nation!

Fonts Used:

https://www.dafont.com/pixelzim3x5.font
https://www.dafont.com/pixel-arial-11.font
